Posts.Content: The facial fuzz is the worst......It freaks me out...Wondering will it go away or is this the new "normal"....
Posts.Title: Ladies....when hair comes back...oh boy!

Posts.Content: Better check with your doc...I was told not to use them because of the chemicals in glue....I think they look great though.Good Luck...
Posts.Title: false eyelashes

Posts.Content: You took the words right out of my mouth....Blessings!!!
Posts.Title: Because some things aren't suitable for Facebook...

Posts.Content: I didn't notice when I started to read this thread that it was an older one! but then I saw my old response! Well here I am 6 months later and I have now gained weight! I do blame it on the tamoxifen!
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and weight gain

Posts.Content: Been on since end of July haven't gained weight but those hot flashes and night sweats are something else..
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and weight gain

Posts.Content: I am 46....My period stopped after my second chemo in May and still not back..Started tamoxifen in July... Doctor still is saying it will return..But I am not missing it.....
Posts.Title: Menstruation and Chemo

Posts.Content: The drippy nose was enough to drive me crazy....I got it after all 3 treatments.....Maybe this last one will be better..?Welcome Jean sorry you have to go thru this bc...stuff...
Posts.Title: What do I expect after next treatments?

Posts.Content: I took this during my chemo treatments with my doc's ok.......I am wondering how long to keep taking? Blessings....
Posts.Title: milk thistle and liver function during chemo

Posts.Content: I have been doing the acupuncture thing too....Did you find it painful at all? Not sure it is helping but any excuse to lay down for a hour or half works for me...lol
Posts.Title: milk thistle and liver function during chemo

Posts.Content: I did my first relay before I had my bc.....and I was a mess...It is the name on those bags...Way too many emotions....It was a sad and glad thing....I will be going for that survivor lap in August.....Sounds like your husband will be right there for you..... Many Blessings!!!!
Posts.Title: Going To My First RELAY FOR LIFE --- My UPDATE On How It Went! :)))))

Posts.Content: I did my first relay before I had my bc.....and I was a mess...It is the name on those bags...Way too many emotions....It was a sad and glad thing....I will be going for that survivor lap in August.....Sounds like your husband will be right there for you..... Many Blessings!!!!
Posts.Title: Going To My First RELAY FOR LIFE --- My UPDATE On How It Went! :)))))

Posts.Content: Glad you are home resting....Boy you sure enough were nervous that bp is something.....My throat hurt after my surgery I said it felt like they used a garden hose..lol Blessings..
Posts.Title: Vicki Sam is home, resting and recovering -- Not too bad // Exchange went well this morning at 7:30, home by 1 p.m.

Posts.Content: Not very good at finding the right words but my heart goes out to you at this difficult time....Praying for you....
Posts.Title: Just when I thought it was safe to go back in the water, I was bitten by Jaws! So to speak...

Posts.Content: Hello! Thats sounds like my standard answer some days.."I am doing fine".....Just did my first chemo. April 29..My lips and nose are so dry feels like a bad sunburn.. Still itching like crazy but the nausea has finally let up....But everyday is better so I am just trusting the Lord to get to the end..I have same t/c 3 more to go. Will be glad to see July 4 get here since that will be end of chemo....Thanks for letting me know...Babette

Posts.Content: Hey Balentine I have been wondering how you are? You were just starting your treatments when i first started reading on here and I haven't seen how you are making out..? Your picture could be a twin to my sister nlaw....Your smile is great..Sorry I do not know about your procedure but I think when you have confidence in the doctor thats half the battle..I know God will lead you to what you need.Blessings Babette
Posts.Title: Update on DIEP vs TRAM flap procedure decisions

Posts.Content: Mine was 21 which put me as they say in the "grey area". I am in a study [TaylorX] and was randomized for chemo treatments!I also got two diff doc. opinions!You must choose what is best for you!
Posts.Title: If you had oncotype, what was your score?

Posts.Content: I am in same boat as you will be seeing the doc. tomorrow for the prescription...It is just another step in beating this bc beast....But the side affects really are enough to make you stop and think....
Posts.Title: reoccurrences and tamoxifen?

Posts.Content: Suzanne, I did have chemo! In the study it is a 50/50 chance. Everything about my bc made it a hard decision for me. So I just ended up being comfortable with either and the study.So I guess my choice was not to choose...I think the study is closed now?! I am praying that I will still be here when they release the results! Blessings!
Posts.Title: If you had oncotype, what was your score?

Posts.Content: Anyone have sleep issues after bc? It was a rough night so I just decided to get up and do something besides tossing and turning.....Of course I could be doing something more constructive like cleaning my messy house or paying bills but priorities sure change...
Posts.Title: Sleep?

Posts.Content: Is it decaf? I drink a lot of green tea....I was allowed to take all of my vitamins during treatments... My list is long...The only thing they vetoed was this herb for vomiting/nausea....I am always amazed by the different doctor advice....
Posts.Title: Supplements to strengthen immunity?

Posts.Content: Hey I had this with all 4 of my treatments but with the IV....I didn't have any side effects from it.. Most of the symptoms decribed here I blamed on the benadryl.....Did you ask your doctor why they were giving it to you? You are half way done Tulsa...YEa...
Posts.Title: Decadron
